name: No Control (7Mar)
description:
Build a Path for your Player !!

A game were you need to build a way for your player to win

this game is made for the "Godot Wild Jam #31" Enjoy :)

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button : Drag  to Place Blocks
  • Right Mouse Button : Remove Blocks

Credit:

  • The amazing Music is made by VOiD1 Gaming
  • The nice Sound effect is made by Noah Kuehne

And Don't Forget To Leave Your Feedback
